summary.title: Advanced Website Development
summary.description: Students learn intermediate skills and techniques used in webpage development. Topics include: the use of styles, documents that automatically display other documents, interactive JavaScript, frames, HTML creation/conversion tools, using XML to manage content, an introduction to database theory, and use of basic SQL programming.

Develop strong system development and programming skills in key technologies that are used for web development.
Understand the issues of user interaction and usability that arises when designing and implementing on-line interactive media systems.
Gain a thorough understanding of database integration within web sites.
Develop a strong knowledge of web server and application security.
Be able to develop and manage complete web sites.
